'''Satiety Gel''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Mint Jelly]] with [[Aloy]]. The [[recipe]] for [[Mint Jelly]] is obtainable from [[Good Hunter]] for 1,250 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 15.

Satiety Gel restores '''16'''% of Max HP and an additional '''1,350''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
